name: Entice Fey
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Intrigue © 2016, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (offerings worth 1,250 gp plus payment), DF
effect: one or two called fey, totaling no more than 12 Hit Dice, which can't appear more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions as lesser entice fey, except that the spell's whimsical calling can produce a single fey of 12 Hit Dice or less, or two fey of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 12.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（报酬外加价值1250gp的祭品，见后文），法器
effect_zh: 1或2个被呼唤的精类，总生命骰不超过12，这些精类彼此之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同次等引诱精类（Entice Fey, Lesser）一般，不过法术那无法预料的呼唤效果能引来单个生命骰为12或更低的精类，或者2个相同种类的精类（其总生命骰不超过12）。
